title: These mushroom-based chips could power your devices and help save our planet
description: Scientists in Austria have come up with a novel way to replace unrecyclable plastic polymers that form the base, or substrate, of electronic chips with this easy-to-grow and high-performing fungi.

title: This inexpensive record cleaner will keep your albums sounding great
description: When buying used albums, one of the first things you should do is clean them. Save money on this cleaner, so you can spend that extra cash on new records.

title: How to use Dream by WOMBO to generate artwork in any style
description: With this AI-based website, you can create images in a specific style -- realistic, mystical, vibrant, dark fantasy -- or upload an existing image that you want to tweak.

title: Apple's latest Pride Edition Watch band launches May 23
description: In addition to the band, a matching watch face and iPhone wallpaper will be available next week.

title: Creators rejoice: Apple adds Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro to iPad
description: Video and sound editing is about to get much simpler and accessible.

title: How to use Craiyon AI (formerly known as DALL-E mini)
description: The free web version of Craiyon will generate art, drawings, and photos from your text descriptions. There's also a Craiyon Android app.

title: How to use Opera's Speed Dial to quickly get to your favorite sites
description: Opera's Speed Dial feature makes opening your favorite websites a breeze. Find out how to manage this feature so it becomes the bookmark tab you've always needed.

title: Need more cooling for your Raspberry Pi (or other SBC) than a heatsink and fan? Try this
description: If your single-board computer project faces an unusually warm environment, try a Peltier thermoelectric cooler module. It's a weird effect, but a great way to keep something cool.

title: This new assistive tech allows users to control electronics with their tongues
description: No one should be excluded from the digital revolution. This MIT spinoff is determined to give people with disabilities more and better access.

title: 70% of employees are happy to delegate work to AI, according to new Microsoft report
description: Fears of AI replacing human labor may be a thing of the past.

title: GE Cync is bringing the smarts to neon lights
description: The company is launching new smart lights with a twist - literally.

title: Need an online form? This new AI tool will build that for you
description: Formless will make creating a customized online form as easy as talking to ChatGPT.

title: Microsoft 365 Copilot expands availability through a new early access program
description: Microsoft expands access to its workspace AI integration and adds several new features. Here's what to know.

title: This easy-to-use portable power station keeps you charged up wherever you roam
description: The PowerRoam 1200 has it all -- 2100W of power, USB and AC outlets, high-quality EV-rated LiFePO4 batteries, and super-fast charging.

title: Singapore pitches new law to slow spread of cybercrime
description: The Singapore government is looking to pass new legislation that will allow it to issue directives to combat the "scale and speed" of cyber-criminal activity, including blocking access to suspected scam sites.

title: Hybrid working or back to the office, here's how to keep everyone engaged
description: While many of us enjoy working remotely at least some of the time, it's a challenge to find the right balance between home and office workers.

title: Hybrid and remote work: The state of play in 2023
description: Remote and hybrid working is here to stay: the focus going forward is on fine-tuning and optimizing these new work practices.
